saitin umarni: Tarin umarni da CPU zai iya fahimta
yin rijista: Ƙananan, wurin ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya mai sauri a cikin CPU
karanta kawai \u0199wa\u0199walwar ajiya: Adana umarnin da ke da mahimmanci don farawa kwamfutar
cache memory: Karami, ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya mai sauri kusa da CPU don saurin shiga
gudun agogo: Adadin da CPU ke aiwatar da umarni
girman kalma: Adadin ragowar da CPU ke iya aiwatarwa a lokaci ɗaya
bututu: Dabarar inda CPU ke karya umarni zuwa matakai don aiki akan masu yawa lokaci guda
multiprocessing: Amfani da CPUs da yawa ko muryoyi don aiwatar da ayyuka lokaci guda
katse: Alamar da ke dakatar da CPU na ɗan lokaci don gudanar da wani taron
\u0199wa\u0199walwar ajiya: Dabarar amfani da sararin faifai a matsayin tsawo na RAM
bios: Tsarin Input/Fitarwa na asali, firmware wanda ke fara kayan aikin a farawa
i/o tashar jiragen ruwa: Adireshin takamaiman akan kwamfutar don sadarwa tare da na'urori masu gefe
direban na'urar: Software wanda ke ba da damar tsarin aiki don sarrafa na'ura
endianness: Tsarin da ake adana bytes a ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya
tsarin sadarwa: Saitin ƙa'idodi da ƙa'idodi don sadarwa tsakanin na'urori
fakiti: Ƙananan raka'a na bayanan da aka watsa ta hanyar hanyar sadarwa
na'ura mai ba da hanya tsakanin hanyoyin: Na'urar da ke tura fakiti tsakanin cibiyoyin sadarwa daban-daban
subnet mask: Ana amfani da shi don ƙayyade hanyar sadarwa da sassan mai masaukin adireshin IP
topology: Tsarin na'urori da haɗin kai a cikin hanyar sadarwa
samfurin uwar garken abokin ciniki: Gine-ginen hanyar sadarwa inda abokan ciniki ke neman albarkatu daga sabobin
dma: Samun damar ƙwaƙwalwar ajiya kai tsaye, yana bawa na'urori damar canja wurin bayanai ba tare da amfani da CPU ba
